message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR 

The paper deals with the problem of video classification and annotation, specifically for human action recognition. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper proposes a semi-supervised learning approach using Hessian regularization, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also deals with multi-modal content and different representations, which could fall under multimedia (cs.MM) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper involves optimization of a loss function, which could fall under information retrieval (cs.IR).
